page.title: 12Wooler First School
page.content: In September 1985 Woler First School is celebrating its 25th. Anniversary. The school opened on the 1.9.1960 with 69 infants,including 40 from the Church of England School - Wooler County Primary School- and 16 new starters. The old school used to be in the bu- ilding that is now the library.The new school was not ifficially opened until 1962.It still did not admit 7+ children until 1968 when the Church of England School,which was sited in the bus station car park,closed its doors for the last time. A series of celebrations are being held to mark the anniversary and a Silver Jubilee Fund has been set up to raise money to buy computers for the classrooms.
